prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: University of Virginia Names Committee General Records, Accession #RG-20/28/1.921, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was transferred to the library on 1992 November 11.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The papers are comprised of correspondence, memoranda, minutes, and biographical information about members of the university community.

Also included is a document entitled, "Brief biographical sketches of the people for whom the residential houses at the University of Virginia were named," compiled by Chester R. Titus for the University Committee on Names, 1990 May.

unittitle.title: Brief Biographical Sketches of the People for Whom the Residential Houses at the University of Virginia were Named
